Pacifying Voice.name: Pacifying Voice
Pacifying Voice.flavor: You croon in quiet tones that calm the rage in your enemyâ€™s heart.
Pacifying Voice.onHit: Until the end of your next turn, the target is dazed and weakened and takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Inspired Solutions.name: Inspired Solutions
Inspired Solutions.flavor: Your calm leadership inspires your allies to find creative, nonviolent solutions to a challenge.
Inspired Solutions.target: You and each ally in the burst
Inspired Solutions.effect: Each target can take an extra standard action as part of his or her next turn. The target cannot spend this extra action to make an attack that deals damage.

Soothing Song.name: Soothing Song
Soothing Song.flavor: You sing a gentle lullaby that causes your foes to sink into a deep sleep and gives your allies a chance to catch their breath.
Soothing Song.onHit:
The target falls unconscious (save ends). Each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge.
If an ally attacks an affected target, the target immediately awakens. The ally does not have combat advantage against the target for that attack and cannot make a coup de grace attack against it.
